trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Monongahela
There were no other sightings in Monongahela on or around August 7th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsWas driving home after getting food and gas in Monongahela. Noticed a large triangle made up of 3 pulsating lights hovering, Stopped my car to watch the lights pulsate and flash different shades of orange and red. I then went home, got ready for work. An hour later I left and the triangle was gone, in the opposite direction I saw 2 pulsating orange lights hovering parallel from each other.
Summary: large triangle made up of 3 pulsating lights, 2 pulsating orange lights
